Features.title: CASM & STARKs
Features.text: Scalable smart contracts with security, privacy, efficiency, natively designed for interoperability and composability.

Features.title: L2 for Scaling, L3 for Customization
Features.text: Souk uses Starknet L2 to scale the application layer, and introduces additional layers to deliver customized functionalities like privacy.

Features.title: Trustless Bridging with Storage Proofs
Features.text: Storage proofs verify states of other chains without the need for trust, creating the future of cross-chain communication without compromising on security and efficiency.

Features.title: ERC-2114 & Semi-Fungible Tokens
Features.text: ERC-2114 provides Souk Apps a highly flexible and versatile framework to represent and tokenize digital assets.
